queryMap.query: SELECT '0' CHK, TSTD.RACE_YY, TSTD.RACE_MM, TSTD.AM_PM_GBN, TSTD.RACE_NO, TSTD.STR_TIME, TSTD.CCIT_CNT, TSTD.RACELEN FROM TBDB_STRT_TIME_DIST TSTD WHERE TSTD.RACE_YY = ? AND TSTD.RACE_MM = ? AND (TSTD.AM_PM_GBN = ? OR ? IS NULL)
INSERT INTO TBDB_STRT_TIME_DIST ( RACE_YY, RACE_MM, AM_PM_GBN, RACE_NO, STR_TIME, CCIT_CNT, RACELEN, INST_ID, INST_DTM ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDB_STRT_TIME_DIST SET STR_TIME = ?, CCIT_CNT = ?, RACELEN = ?, UPDT_ID = ?, UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACE_YY = ? AND RACE_MM = ? AND AM_PM_GBN = ? AND RACE_NO = ?
DELETE FROM TBDB_STRT_TIME_DIST WHERE RACE_YY = ? AND RACE_MM = ? AND AM_PM_GBN = ? AND RACE_NO = ?
